MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD2 postcode area of Lauder, affecting properties in surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:27pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a 2nd fault on the overhead network are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:30pm on the 12th November 2020.
